newsitem.title: UK: KfW unit to launch $500 mln 10-year bond -JPM.
newsitem.headline: KfW unit to launch $500 mln 10-year bond -JPM.

text.p: KfW International Finance Inc is expected to launch a $500 million 10-year Eurobond on Wednesday, J.P. Morgan said in a statement on Tuesday.
Deutsche Morgan Grenfell and J.P. Morgan were mandated to act as joint lead managers for the deal, it said.
The bonds will be guaranteed by Kreditanstalt fuer Wiederaufbau, which is rated triple-A by both Moody's Investors Service and Standard & Poor's.
